summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account holder, Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The statement covers the period from November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017.
The beginning and ending balance for the account was $231.26.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to not meeting balance criteria.
The document indicates that the business did not meet the criteria for a total combined monthly average balance.
